p: Among the subset of individuals who initiated PrEP and reported current HIV risk during follow-up, a high proportion received PrEP refills and self-reported adherence. At weeks 4–72, 89–93% received refills and 70–76% self-reported adherence ( figure 2B). Self-assessed risk also changed over time: 1462 (54%) of 2693 participants seen in follow-up reported no risk at at least one visit. Of 1699 participants reporting current HIV risk at week 4, 330 (19%) reported no risk at week 24; conversely, 96 (20%) of 471 participants who reported no risk at week 4 reported risk at week 24.
